SYN_BRONCH_3_1:
Indication: Bilateral masses.

- RUL: Endobronchial fungating mass. Obstructs Superior/Anterior segs.
- LLL: Peripheral lesion Superior seg.

- LLL Lesion: Radial EBUS (concentric). TBNA (4 passes) + Forceps (5 samples). Bleeding controlled (epi).

ROSE: RUL=Malignant. LLL=Necrosis.
Plan: PACU.
